io.mosip.registration.device.webcam

Interface IMosipWebcamService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MosipWebcamServiceImpl, PhotoCaptureFacade, WebcamSarxosServiceImpl

    public interface IMosipWebcamService
    Interface to access the webcam and its functionalities.
    Author:
    Himaja Dhanyamraju

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BufferedImage captureImage()
      This method captures the image from webcam and return it.
      void close()
      This method is to close the webcam which is open
      void connect(int width, int height)
      This method is to open the first on-boarded camera from the list of webcams with specified resolution.
      JPanel getCameraPanel()
      This method is to get the JPanel to which WebcamPanel is added to open the webcamera.
      boolean isWebcamConnected()
      This method returns true/false based on webcam connectivity.

    • Method Detail

      • getCameraPanel

        JPanel getCameraPanel()
        This method is to get the JPanel to which WebcamPanel is added to open the webcamera.
        Returns:
        JPanel - the JPanel to which WebcamPanel is added.

      • isWebcamConnected

        boolean isWebcamConnected()
        This method returns true/false based on webcam connectivity.
        Returns:
        boolean - if webcam is connected, it returns true, otherwise, false

      • connect

        void connect(int width,
             int height)
        This method is to open the first on-boarded camera from the list of webcams with specified resolution.
        Parameters:
        width - Required width for the camera to be set-up.
        height - Required height for the camera to be set-up.

      • captureImage

        BufferedImage captureImage()
        This method captures the image from webcam and return it. Will return image object or null if webcam is closed or has been already disposed by JVM.
        Returns:
        BufferedImage returns the image object that is captured from the webcam.

      • close

        void close()
        This method is to close the webcam which is open
